description: Pronoun prefix conjugation mappings and morpheme structures for the Eastern dialect of Kanien’kéha.
source: Kanien’kéha data gathering with fluent speakers in Akwesasne.

ethical_guidelines.community_involvement: Reviewed and approved by a panel of Kanien’kéhae technicians, speakers, elders and educators in Akwesasne.
ethical_guidelines.data_sovereignty: All language data remains the intellectual and cultural property of the Akwesasne Kanien’kehà:ka.
ethical_guidelines.cultural_safety: This dataset may not be redistributed without express Community permission, no individuals are able to provide express permission on behalf of the entire Community.
